entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:57 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow early in the evening. Local blowing snow in the evening and overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. High minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
